name: Windtalker
description:
Introduction

Windtalker is a nice canyon, easy approach with little crowds and tourists.

Approach

Follow the same approach as per Magic Canyon.

Descent

R1: 200’ free hanging in parts off of bolt anchor.

Downclimb LDC (or possible rappel with runoff).

R2: 50’ off of bolt anchor in the watercourse.

R3: 110’ off of a tiny bush directly at the base of R2.

Exit

Hike side canyon to Hartwell and back to car.

Red tape

Beta sites

Trip reports and media

Background

Preserve all arche sites. First descent by Garrett Bennett and Ron Paradis in February of 2021.
